ValidationRule.description: For countries that have state (i.e. State = Country), then State should be null.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.Name == 'EMAP Fuel Accounts', NOT(ISBLANK( ShippingState )), OR( (ShippingCountry = "Guam"), (ShippingCountry = "New Zealand"), (ShippingCountry = "Saipan"), (ShippingCountry = "Singapore") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please remove Shipping state, it is not required.
